channel.title: CVE Feed for Fuji Electric -- V-Server Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fuji Electric -- V-Server Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-38401|2024-08-04T01:37:16.513Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: Fuji Electric V-Server Lite and Tellus Lite V-Simulator prior to v4.0.12.0 is vulnerable to an untrusted pointer dereference, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code and cause the application to crash.

item.title: CVE-2021-38421|2024-08-04T01:44:22.159Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: Fuji Electric V-Server Lite and Tellus Lite V-Simulator prior to v4.0.12.0 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read, which may allow an attacker to read sensitive information from other memory locations or cause a crash.

item.title: CVE-2021-38415|2024-08-04T01:44:22.244Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: Fuji Electric V-Server Lite and Tellus Lite V-Simulator prior to v4.0.12.0 is vulnerable a heap-based buffer overflow when parsing a specially crafted project file, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-38419|2024-08-04T01:44:22.450Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: Fuji Electric V-Server Lite and Tellus Lite V-Simulator prior to v4.0.12.0 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which can result in data corruption, a system crash, or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-25171|2024-08-04T15:26:10.248Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: The affected Fuji Electric V-Server Lite versions prior to 3.3.24.0 are vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-38409|2024-08-04T01:37:16.652Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: Fuji Electric V-Server Lite and Tellus Lite V-Simulator prior to v4.0.12.0 is vulnerable to an access of uninitialized pointer, which may allow an attacker read from or write to unexpected memory locations, leading to a denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2021-38413|2024-08-04T01:44:22.252Z -- fuji%20electric -- v-server%20lite
item.description: Fuji Electric V-Server Lite and Tellus Lite V-Simulator prior to v4.0.12.0 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to achieve code execution.
